trans-unit.source: Sets the line alignment of a StringFormat object in relation to the origin of a layout rectangle

seg-source.mrk: Sets the line alignment of a StringFormat object in relation to the origin of a layout rectangle

target.mrk: Sets the line alignment of a StringFormat object in relation to the origin of a layout rectangle

trans-unit.source: Type of line alignment to use:

seg-source.mrk: Type of line alignment to use:

target.mrk: Type of line alignment to use:

trans-unit.source: 0 - Alignment is towards the origin of the bounding rectangle

seg-source.mrk: 0 - Alignment is towards the origin of the bounding rectangle

target.mrk: 0 - Alignment is towards the origin of the bounding rectangle

trans-unit.source: 1 - Alignment is centered between origin and the height of the formatting rectangle

seg-source.mrk: 1 - Alignment is centered between origin and the height of the formatting rectangle

target.mrk: 1 - Alignment is centered between origin and the height of the formatting rectangle

trans-unit.source: 2 - Alignment is to the far extent (right side) of the formatting rectangle

seg-source.mrk: 2 - Alignment is to the far extent (right side) of the formatting rectangle

target.mrk: 2 - Alignment is to the far extent (right side) of the formatting rectangle

trans-unit.source: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

seg-source.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

target.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

trans-unit.source: The line alignment setting specifies how to align the string vertically in the layout rectangle.

seg-source.mrk: The line alignment setting specifies how to align the string vertically in the layout rectangle.

target.mrk: The line alignment setting specifies how to align the string vertically in the layout rectangle.

trans-unit.source: The layout rectangle is used to position the displayed string.

seg-source.mrk: The layout rectangle is used to position the displayed string.

target.mrk: The layout rectangle is used to position the displayed string.
